text: The Fer-de-Lance is a combat vessel manufactured by Zorgon Peterson, produced from 3100 to the present. It is renowned for its high damage output and maneuverability, excelling against various opponents, including Thargoid Interceptors and skilled human pilots. Its base shield is the highest among medium-sized ships, and it can exceed 1000MJ of shield with engineering, reaching over 2000MJ. However, it has a low mass lock factor of 12, limiting its ability to mass lock other ships. The Fer-de-Lance is specialized in combat and is less suitable for other roles due to its low jump range and cargo capacity.

The Fer-de-Lance has dimensions of 73.6m x 51.6m x 15.4m, with a hull mass of 250 tons. It features 2 pilot seats, a top speed of 265 m/s (default) or 302 m/s (upgraded), and a boost speed of 357 m/s (default) or 407 m/s (upgraded). Its unladen jump range is 7.04 ly (default) or 20.94 ly (upgraded), with a cargo capacity of 24 t (default) or 72 t (max). The ship has an armour rating of 405, shield capacity of 271 MJ, and a heat capacity of 224.

The Fer-de-Lance features 6 utility mounts, 4 medium hardpoints, and 1 huge hardpoint. Its default outfitting includes Pulse Lasers on two medium hardpoints, with the other two being empty. All utility mounts are initially empty. The ship's internal compartments include 2 Class 1, 1 Class 2, 2 Class 4, and 1 Class 5 compartments, with default systems such as Cargo Rack, Shield Generator, and Supercruise Assist.
